description: For sale in our St. Louis Showroom is a Flamingo Pink 1959 Ford Thunderbird Convertible. This T-Bird underwent an extensive restoration in the mid 1990"??s and still shows very well. The restoration performed was one that honored the originality of the classic Thunderbird. The paint and interior colors remain the same from factory. The exterior is painted in a great looking Flamingo Pink and the interior including the vinyl upholstery is all white. The white vinyl top provides a beautiful look while in use. The paint has aged very well and has plenty of shine left. The brightwork does show a bit of age in some areas a little pitting can be seen here and there. The vinyl interior also shows minor wear in a few areas along with some of the plastic pieces but does present well. All in all considering the age of the restoration this is a fine example of a driver quality 59"?? Thunderbird Convertible. Under the hood you will find a 352 CID 4BBL V8 engine that is mated to a Cruise-o-Matic 3-spd auto transmission. Both the engine and transmission are believed to be original to the car. According to the VIN this 352 V8 was rated at 300 horsepower and the car was built at the Wixon Michigan plant. Options for this 1959 Ford Thunderbird Convertible include: Air Conditioning (inoperable) AM Radio (inoperable) Vinyl Interior Automatic Convertible Top Seat Belts Power Seats Power Steering Wide White Walls Bias Ply Tires and Wire Wheels. This Flamingo Pink T-Bird is ready for a new home and new owners to enjoy it at a local show or on a long cruise to nowhere. To view this 1959 Ford Thunderbird Convertible in greater detail visit www.GatewayClassicCars.com or our St. Louis Showroom. For more information please call 618-271-3000 or email
[Email Dealer]

title: 1960 Ford Thunderbird Square Bird 2 Door Hardtop

description: 1960 Ford Thunderbird “Square Bird” 2 Door Hard Top
If you are interested in this vehicle or have any questions,
please call Marshall at 503-708-5357
Specs:
• Ford Factory Monte Carlo Red
• Factory Red and White Interior
• Padded Dash
• PS, PB
• Factory AM/FM Radio w/cassette and custom speakers
• Full Console
• Fender Skirts
• 300 hp/390 ci V-8 w/Cruise-O-Matic Transmission
• New Coker Wire Wheels with White-Wall Tires Frame off restoration completed in 2008.

The restoration was completed over the course of 19 years, starting in 1989. The interior was completed by Pacific Auto Trim. The body and paint was done by Jazzman Custom Auto Restoration. Engine work was completed by McCartney Automotive. All other work was completed by the owner as time and money would allow. Over $45,000 invested in this restoration. All mechanical and electrical systems work properly. Almost everything new, rebuilt or refinished including paint, chrome, wheels and large white-wall tires, exhaust system brakes. Awards This car has won over 30 awards between 2008 and 2015, winning some sort of award at nearly every show.
Some prestigious awards were:
• Forest Grove Concours d' Elegance Car Show Car “Best in class”
• Columbia River Concours d' Elegance “Best in Class”
• Featured in the Oregonian as the winner of the 3rd annual Senior Citizens council in 2012
• 1st Place All Ford Show (Wranglers) 2010
Documentation/Photos:
All restoration documentation including pictures documenting the complete restoration from start to finish may be included with the car purchase.
National Thunderbird Registry shows that only 71 still exist.
No Trades
Vehicle is being sold "as is" with no warranty or guarantee expressed or implied. INSPECTIONS AND QUESTIONS WELCOMED.

1959 Ford Thunderbird,  Nice clean T bird. Ready to show or drive. Full power. Tinted glass Power windows. Bucket seats, counsel. Was AC car, not hooked up. Tires are excellent. Mint intreior. Original panels. Original 430 motor, very rare option. Runs and drives excellent. Solid floors. Ready for a road trip.
1957 Ford Thunderbird Convertible GREAT DRIVER!

This has long been considered one of the first "classic" cars ever with its stylish looks and performance styling standing beside the Corvette of the same year?which it outperforms. Ford produced this smaller sized Thunderbird between 1955 and 1957 and it was known as the first two-door luxury sport automobile ever to be made. It has that classic retro styling and 50?s deluxe interior amenities. This one has undergone a frame-on restoration including an engine overhaul and has been impeccably maintained since.

It is powered by a 312ci V-8 engine pulling 225 horsepower with an Edelbrock 600CFM 4-barrel carburetor coupled to an auto transmission with overdrive making it easy to flow through traffic and a great drive. It has undergone a 12-volt conversion and performs every bit like a contemporary car.

A recent and very pricey interior restoration including a new headliner, dash, seat cover, windows overhauled with new seals for ease-of-use, rear window and windshield seals makes driving a dream. Complete with new floor mats and carpeting complete with new door jamb scuff plates the car looks like new inside. It is equipped with a Retro Stereo with contemporary Bluetooth functions to make cruising a dream. The dash is gorgeous with tooled metal offset by black gauges and they are all free of fog and scratches. The car retains it vacuum wipers but they are newly overhauled and work perfectly.

The exterior is done in rare black lacquer with removable hardtop and it has the iconic porthole windows polished brilliantly. The body is rust free and straight free of any dings but does have a few paint cracks from when it was redone due to the paint being applied too thick. Our shop did a complete color sand, buff and wax and from 5 feet it looks perfect but does have a few flaws. We can repaint the car at a discounted rate if you desire but it is a killer driver right now just as it sits. It has always been garaged and is all steel. It is also equipped with a very rare limo style antenna mounted on the trunk deck. It sits on radial tires with white walls and full tread with T-bird logo hubcaps newly aligned including rotated tires.
Pay $31,000.00 for this one and drive it every day with no worries!
This car is located and being represented for a collector in the Seattle, Washington area.

1957 FORD THUNDERBIRD, WITH WHITE PORT HOLE HARD TOP, NEW WHITE SOFT TOP, WHITE LEATHER INTERIOR, NEW RED LINE TIRES, SPOKE WHEELS, POWER STEERING, POWER BRAKES, FENDER SKIRTS, AIR CONDITIONING, PASSENGER DOOR NEEDS SLIGHT ADJUSTMENT WHICH WE WILL DO SOON, DRIVAN FEW MILES ON REGULAR BASIS SO MILEAGE WILL BE SLIGHTLY MORE EACH WEEK.,  LOOKS GREAT, DRIVES GREAT, LOCATED 609 MAIN ST., TITUSVILLE, FLORIDA 32796 SEE MIKE 321-863-9605

1961 Ford Thunderbird. Only 68K actual miles. Always garaged, maintained and pampered. Life long southern Iowa surviver with envelope full of registrations since 1964. One correct gorgeous refinish (code D=Starlite). Totally straight body, new weather striping, new front and rear bumpers, new chrome hood lips and headlight trim. Under car is dry as can be, same as trunk and sheet metal. Cool factory skirts, almost new radials, dual exhaust, stock tight original 390 stock 4 BL, wow! 300 HP from factory so very efficient with almost 10:1 compression. PS, PB, stock code 4 automatic (shifts great). Excellent original interior with cloth inserts. Famous tilt away steering. No cracks in dash, clear gauges and very attractive stock center console. Stock code 6 300:1 highway gears. Door panels excellent, original white perforated headliner and visors all excellent. Factory seat belt option, so that's nice! All lights work in and out. Excellent original trunk mat (more evidence of low miles and garaged). All new (6) Thunderbird emblems and new chromed original wiper blades. Even original wiper washer bag under hood. Turn key first year body is excellent/honest condition. Drive and show right off our delivery truck. Bob 1-866-641-7427, WE OFFER OUR OWN NATIONWIDE SHIPPING AT A MUCH BETTER RATE! "WE MAKE IT EASY" View our entire inventory online: Classic442.com . Please Call for availability.

title: 1955 Ford Thunderbird 55 Roadster Wires Hardtop 292 V8 Auto Runs And Dri

description: Welcome to StreetDreamsTexas as we celebrate our 19th year in the classic and muscle car business. Ford's Thunderbird, particularly the 1955-1957 two-seat models, has been a favorite of both cruisers and collectors alike for decades. The classic styling of these first-generation cars remains as relevant and attractive as ever. Our pretty blue 'Bird received an amateur restoration several years back, so while she looks great cruising to the drive-in, she'll need some TLC before she's entered at Pebble Beach. Features include the 292 ci Thunderbird V8, automatic transmission, power steering, auxiliary gauges, newer radio, and Kelsey-Hayes wire wheels with wide whitewall radial tires. The hardtop fits well and is easily removed, but there is no soft top. Come drive a timeless classic offered at a bargain price. Street Dreams is a full service dealership that can assist with worldwide delivery, insurance, and financing options.

You are looking at a 1958 Ford Thunderbird Convertible.  This vehicles original engine has been swapped out to a 428 cubic inch V8 that produces 340 horsepower from a 1967 Thunderbird and is connected to a C6 three speed automatic transmission. The heads have been redone and hardened valve seats were installed allowing use of unleaded gasoline. Other features under the hood include power steering, power brakes, air conditioning, new oil, fuel, water pumps, new plug wires and a new radiator. The interior comes in Black leather and has very light cracking in the seats. The dashboard, door panels, and interior moldings are in great shape and show no damage. Other interior features include original AM radio, aftermarket stereo unit located in the glove box, power windows, power top switch that is located in the trunk, and also includes a roadster top. This Thunderbird sports a coat of White paint which is mostly original that does need work and has a White vinyl top to match. It sits on Kelsey Hayes wire wheels that are wrapped in Coker white wall tires which are stopped by power disc brakes upfront and drums in the rear. Other exterior features include a continental kit, rear air shocks, and a front sway bar. Take this 1 of 2,134 Thunderbird's built in 1958 on a long cruise and enjoy that larger V8 with family and friends in style!

1956 Ford Thunderbird,  Car was ordered by a military person and shipped from the plant to Europe. The speedometer and mileage are in Kilometers(70,352 KM/ 43,715 M). This is an early model year build, with no porthole in the hardtop. The vehicle was shipped to Arizon sometime in the 1960's where it was kept. The son of the owner inherited it, and shipped the car to Minnesota, where it was stored until we purchased it. The car has never seen snow and was not driven very much since it was purchased. The convertible top is in great shape. The car runs well.

It just doesn't get any better!! This Thunderbird is simply great in every aspect. One of the finest cars around, you won't believe what you get for the money*** Includes a CARFAX buyback guarantee** Spotless!

For sale in our Fort Lauderdale showroom is this beautiful 1956 Ford Thunderbird. The first generation of the Thunderbird was Ford"??s answer to Chevrolet"??s Corvette. The Tbird story started in 1953 on paper and Ford showed the first prototype in early 1954. Even though it was a rapid development Ford did a fantastic job and today the early Thunderbirds are on top of the list of almost every car enthusiast in the world. This particular 1956 Ford Thunderbird is a very nice driver. Lady owned for the past 10 years and she took good care of her "??Baby Bird"? Olivia. For many people the cars from the 50"??s are considered a piece of art. It is a pleasure to just walk around this turquoise Thunderbird and see the many details and the great craftmanship. After the walk around you want to get in the drivers seat and take off in it. This Tbird is powered by its 292ci V8 engine and shifted by an automatic transmission. You will have a good time driving this one around town. A major plus is that the car comes with both tops the port hole hardtop and a soft top. To put an additional soft top in an early Thunderbird would cost you between $4000 and $5000. Folks this one has it already folded up behind the bench seat. The continental kit and the white wall tires are a perfect fit to the Bird. This is a great buy if you are not looking to spent a fortune on one. This is a great driver that is ready for new adventures. Let it ride.To see 100+ HD pictures and a video of this 1956 Ford Thunderbird please visit www.GatewayClassicCars.com. For more information or to schedule an appointment to view the car in person please call the Fort Lauderdale showroom at (954) 227-4202 or email us directly at
[Email Dealer]

Take a look at this BEAUTIFUL !! - RARE - 102K ACTUAL MILES - PAMPERED 1961 Ford Thunderbird Two Door Hardtop !! It is RARE as only 62,535 Thunderbird Hardtop Coupes were built in 1961, the FIRST and BEST year of the 3rd generation "Big Bird" Thunderbirds !! We recently purchased this Thunderbird from the previous retired owner and as you can tell in the pictures and video it has been his pride and joy !! It only has 102,254 ACTUAL ORIGINAL MILES, although we have no documentation to prove it. This Thunderbird still retains it's correctly mounted - FACTORY ORIGINAL - driver's door mounted data / VIN plate - ORIGINAL - 1961 Thunderbird sales poster and the - ORIGINAL - 1961 Thunderbird accessories booklet, all of which are shown in several pictures. This is a NICE - DRY - SOLID - Idaho High Mountain Desert - Western car and it shows !! I drove this Thunderbird as my daily driver for the last several days and it runs and drives VERY WELL !! This T-Bird is a sweet driver in town and cruises down the freeway easily and smoothly. The steering, brakes and suspension are nice and tight and this car drives EXTREMELY well. If you can make it to Boise, please come and take a look at and drive this BEAUTY for yourself this This is a QUALITY CLASSIC THUNDERBIRD THAT IS READY TO DRIVE, SHOW AND ENJOY !!

At the heart of this Thunderbird is what appears to be the VERY STRONG !! - FACTORY ORIGINAL - Code "Z" - 390 CID V8 motor that is running VERY well. The motor also sports the ORIGINAL four barrel intake manifold, ORIGINAL exhaust manifolds, Aluminum valve covers, ORIGINAL Chrome air cleaner housing and the ORIGINAL 4 barrel carburetor !! Sounds GREAT too with the factory style true dual exhaust system with dual chrome tips. The engine is backed by a SMOOTH - Code "4" - three speed "Cruise-O-Matic" automatic transmission which also functions very well. The BEAUTIFUL !! - MOSTLY ORIGINAL - Code "52" Medium Blue Vinyl bucket seat Thunderbird interior is in VERY NICE condition with NICE Medium Blue Vinyl front bucket seats, NICE Medium Blue carpets, NICE ORIGINAL Matching Medium Blue Vinyl door panels, VERY NICE ORIGINAL Factory gauge clusters, VERY NICE ORIGINAL Thunderbird steering wheel, VERY NICE ORIGINAL Blue Vinyl center console, VERY NICE ORIGINAL White Vinyl headliner, VERY NICE ORIGINAL White Vinyl sun visors, VERY NICE Medium Blue Vinyl rear bucket bench seat and a VERY NICE ORIGINAL Medium Blue Vinyl dash pad with NO CRACKS !! The GORGEOUS !! - Code "N" - Diamond White exterior finish is EYE POPPING BEAUTIFUL showing a few very small chips and imperfections that have been touched up but still looks STUNNING as you can clearly see in the VIDEO & 50 ADDITIONAL PICTURES !! This T-Bird comes nicely equipped including factory power steering, factory power brakes, working factory power windows, factory front wing windows, working factory 4-way power driver's seat, original day / night rear view mirror, good heater and defroster, front seat belts, factory "swing-away" steering column, original dual chrome side view mirrors, factory power wipers, original style Thunderbird floor mats, factory gauge clusters with 120 MPH speedometer, original clock which is no longer working, awesome Custom AutoSound digital AM / FM stereo radio, factory fender skirts and factory back up lights. This Thunderbird has GORGEOUS looks and AWESOME 390 V8 power as well ! There are not many of these left on the roads for sure !

The suspension and drive line seem to be in good working order as well as the electrical system. Check out the AWESOME - FACTORY ORIGINAL - Thunderbird stainless steel wheel covers and BRAND NEW Hankook whitewall steel belted radial tires, they look OUTSTANDING on this Thunderbird and really retains that CLEAN "Factory Original" - look !! All of the ORIGINAL Chrome and Stainless Steel exterior body trim and moldings are in VERY NICE condition including VERY NICE ORIGINAL Chrome front and rear bumpers, VERY NICE ORIGINAL Badging and VERY NICE ORIGINAL grill and headlight surrounds. The CLEAN - SOLID trunk also sports the ORIGINAL white vinyl liner, a full size spare tire and the ORIGINAL jack and lug wrench !! All of the ORIGINAL light lenses and reflectors are also clear, bright, UN-CRACKED and BEAUTIFUL !! I looked underneath and also included photos below, again this is a NICE - DRY - SOLID - Idaho High Mountain Desert - western vehicle and it shows !! In my opinion, you're not going to find much nicer SOLID ORIGINAL floors than the one's on this BEAUTY !! Please pay close attention to the VIDEO & THE 50 ADDITIONAL PICTURES and this description as they will answer your questions.
